descriptionHtml:
[b]- What it does -[/b]
It removes the invisible borders around Skyrim

[b]- Installation -[/b]
Place in ..\\Skyrim\\Data\\ folder and make sure that the .esp file it is activated in the launcher.

[b]- Removal -[/b]
Remove \"MZ No Border.esp\" file.

[b]- Permissions -[/b]
Feel free to merge this into any other mod. Credit not necassary but appreciated.

[b]- Bugs -[/b]
The map name of Skyrim is now Himmelsrand as from the german version. Will be fixed soon.


Have fun
MorpheuZ/Sronthgorrth
author: MorpheuZ
